description:
Sasaki Isaburo`s past with the Shinsengumi, Matsudaira, and Imai Nobume is finally revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 6: Le message non reçu
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Six: Undelivered Mail
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Roku: Todokanakatta Mail
さらば真選組篇六 届かなかったメール
